title: Winter Camp
description: What would happen if Summer Camp was in Australia?

text: 'We have decided,' Billy said, 'to move Summer Camp to Australia'.
We were baffled, but accepted our surpreme leader's decision without question. After all, he must have a good reason for it?
That was two months ago. Now, all of you are sitting in a freight container bound for Perth, at the western coastline of Australia.
